about_the_game:
Get your hair perm done, put on your leather leggings and get strapped for this full-on, hardcore 80s synth experience.
Door Kickers: Action Squad Soundtrack, by Gavin Harrison. Guitar by Lorenzo De Feo.

Tracklist
01 Groove Overload
02 Patrol Duty
03 To Happy Ends
04 Stakeout
05 Night Call
06 Training Day (Montage)
07 Ready To Roll
08 Cartel Territory
09 Day to Night
10 On Vacation
11 Word On The Street
12 Action Squad

Includes files in MP3 and WAV format. Once purchased, files will be available in your SteamApps folder under ...Steam\steamapps\common\DoorKickers: Action Squad\Soundtrack
